comment: PRE-REVIEW VERIFICATION COMPLETE. Frontmatter verified: title='Requalify SSE Transport (REQ-MCP-011/012/013)', revision_summary='Initial draft'. All required CR sections present per SOP-002 Section 6. Purpose clearly identifies requalification of SSE transport (REQ-MCP-011/012/013) implementing INV-008 CAPA-001. Scope correctly references INV-008 as parent document. Current/Proposed State well-defined with declarative statements. Change Description provides technical details for integration tests and RTM update. Justification addresses problem (qualification gap), impact (RTM confidence), and solution (integration tests). Impact Assessment complete with Development Controls (7 items) and Qualified State Continuity table correctly showing CLI-4.0 to CLI-5.0 transition. Testing Summary describes two test functions plus regression. Implementation Plan has 7 phases with clear steps. Execution block contains EI table with 5 items and appropriate template placeholders for execution phase. References section complete. Traceability verified: INV-008 confirmed IN_EXECUTION at v1.0 with CAPA-001 defined as requalification CR. No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) in pre-approved sections. Formatting consistent throughout. Recommend approval.
